alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, northeastern St. James, northwestern St. Charles, southeastern Livingston and southwestern Tangipahoa Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitehall, or 10 miles northwest of Reserve, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Reserve, Laplace, Ponchatoula, Springfield, Killona, Montz, Edgard, Garyville and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 193 and 211. Interstate 12 between mile markers 36 and 40. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
